DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , single-center , randomized trial , intend compare three revascularization strategy patient multi-vessel coronary artery disease : 1 . Hybrid approach ( Minimally invasive off-pump revascularization leave anterior descend artery ( LAD ) leave internal mammary artery ( LIMA ) bypass follow consecutive percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) rest artery drug elute stent ( DES ) ( Hybrid group , n=50 ) 2 . Multi-vessel PCI DES ( MV-PCI group , n=50 ) 3 . Coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) treatment ( CABG group , n=50 ) PCI Hybrid MV-PCI group perform 2nd generation clinically proven DES ( Xience V , Xience Prime ) . Study objective Compare three different revascularization strategy patient multi-vessel coronary disease The endpoint : The primary endpoint death , MI , stroke , new myocardial ischemia TVR non-TVR 30 day , 12 month 5-year follow-up . The secondary endpoint : Procedural success , Procedural post-procedural blood loss number transfusion , Recovery time , Heart Failure ( New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) ) , life quality assess one life quality questionnaire
